channel.title: ProductManagement on Dibyendu Tapadar
channel.description: Recent content in ProductManagement on Dibyendu Tapadar

item.title: Lead Product Manager - AI @Planful
item.description: Implementing practical use of AI/ML in FP&A and Performance Management (CPM/FPM) at Planful.

item.title: Sr. Product Lead @Brane Enterprises Pvt. Ltd.
item.description: Led 52 engineers to build a no-code Site-Builder tool reducing UI development time by 50%.

item.title: Sr. Product Manager @BYJU’S
item.description: Shipped AI-powered offline assessment platform and unified systems reducing infra costs by 58%.

item.title: Sr. Product Manager @Khan Academy
item.description: Partnered with state governments to grow users 10× and launched a WhatsApp chatbot.

item.title: Product Manager @Mahindra Auto Digitech Pvt. Ltd.
item.description: Launched Carworkz.com and DearO SaaS earning two Mahindra innovation awards.
